content: Tshepang Lekhonkhobe has marked this topic as resolved.
Another option: you can use cargo fmt -- --config use_try_shorthand=true .

Not guaranteed to actually compile afterward, due to the aforementioned semantic differences, but it'll go through and replace all your uses of try! with ? and then you can fix up the result afterwards if it doesn't compile.
rust-analyzer has semantic search and replace. I believe the author of rerast contributed a lot to this functionality in the past.
